name: Summer
info: A Sinner who is adept at Physical Output. Summer automatically summons [Drones] while in combat. This effect has a 20-second cooldown. [Drones] prioritize enemies attacking Summer, and deal (Summer's Attack *20%) Physical Damage each time. 4 [Drones] can exist on the battlefield at most. Lasts until the end of battle.

maniaIntensifyText: At the start of battle, Summer instantly summons 1 [Drone].
criminalRecord:
Suspected to be a dangerous scientist spy with some anti-EDGE tendency. Once praised as an extremely rare genius, the subject was the Ring Research Institute's youngest member. The subject was exposed for owning the core technology of a classified forbidden weapon without permission. She refused the institute's collaboration request and betrayed the institute.

The subject's behaviors directly led to the leak of Ring Weapon technology into the market and facilitated the creation of Mania Weapons, greatly worsening the violence in Syndicate.

--

It's now been proven that the Research Institute violated the regulations early on and sold Ring Weapon-related technology to Parma. The contamination-loaded Mania weapons available in the market are products of Parma's evil research.

It's confirmed that the subject has invented a contamination-free Ring Weapon. Her invention has improved the lives of many and she provides essential support behind various major missions of the Bureau.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
The subject has lower-than-average physical health statistics but her intelligence far exceeds the mean, the upper limit of her IQ indeterminable by any currently available tests. Uses a personally developed drone-like Ring Weapon to aid fights.

+++* Awakening Signs
As reported by the Ring Research Institute, the subject carried out multiple unauthorized experiments during her tenure in the institute and purposely approached sources of contamination. It's believed that the accumulation of contaminants in her body reached a breaking point and triggered the awakening.

+++* Corruption State
Relies too much on the Ring Weapon to move around, leading to muscle degeneration and a weaker body. But the growth of her Mania level is significantly lower than that in normal people, so it's believed that the subject was born with higher compatibility with the Ring Substance.
ecbFlavourText: "If all the adults choose to flee, then it's up to me to be the hero!"
interrogation1:
After the events of Unclaimed Crypt, the Chief contacts the Ring Research Institute regarding the nature of Mania Crystals. The scientist they speak to over the phone doesn't have the answers, instead pointing them to Summer, and provides them with an item they can use to pique her interest. Some time later, the Chief meets a disinterested Summer in the interrogation room, who dodges the question after the Chief shows her a Mania weapon. The Chief then produces the item: a heavily encrypted data drive that no one in the MBCC could crack. Summer lights up, promising to answer any question in exchange for it, and the Chief agrees. Summer cracks the code in seconds. The drive contains a video, a storyboard for the first episode of an animated series titled //The Age of Youth//. It is based loosely on her life, beginning with when a young, sickly Summer saw an anime that first motivated her to become a hero, launching her on her impressive early tear through academia. The Chief asks once more about Mania Crystals and the nature of the "Ring substance" that they are made of. Summer likens the situation in the crypt to a glass of water: much like a lower temperature would cause more ice to form in the glass, a higher contamination rate would cause more Ring substance to form inside the crypt. A Mania Crystal, she explains, is what happens when Ring substance absorbs a Sinner's [[[spiritual energy]]]. Unlike regular contamination from Manic humans, the Ring substance seems to draw its power from elsewhere, though she has yet to find out where. She knows that [[[PARMA]]] has some means to force Sinners to maintain a Manic state in order to lengthen the time in which the Ring substance can form Mania Crystals, citing Ninety-Nine as a victim of such experiments. On the topic of PARMA, the Chief produces a distress signal that came from one of their labs, supposedly related to Mania weapons. When they question Summer on whether she knows about the incident, she arbitrarily decides to end their so-called "Q&A session," instead rushing off to watch more anime.

Mania Crystals, the Ring substance.... These mysterious and deadly substances seem to be mere playthings in Summer's hands. No one expected this mad genius to have such a deep secret. The videotape has resolved the question that no one could answer. At least for now, you want your relationship to be one of mentor and friend instead of Sinner and warden.
interrogation2:
Some time after the Chief absorbs the Inheritance, they begin to experience a recurring nightmare in which they are devoured by a Corpseborne, demanding that they "accept the Gift." Despite the unsettling nature of it, the Chief describes the feeling of the corruption as natural and familiar. Upon waking up, they once again contact the Ring Research Institute, and before they can even explain, the scientist sends them to Summer once again, providing them with another encrypted drive. Not having shared the details of what happened with anyone outside the Bureau, the Chief suspects that the Institute may be spying on them. The next episode of //The Age of Youth// details Summer's progress on the Ring weapon after being expelled from the Institute. This time, having spent the last few months building up a rapport, Summer comments that the Chief is less anxious when they spend time together. She asks what difficult questions have been on their mind lately, and the Chief asks about the nature of Black Rings. As Summer begins to muse on the topic, the Chief recalls the feeling of absorbing the corruption at Keylan Square, almost vomiting in the process. Summer describes how being stuck inside a Black Ring can lead one to becoming subsumed by the will of its host. She explains that the Ring substance is a byproduct of this will invading reality, saying that it contains "extremely strong mental power", hence why she chose it to power her Ring Weapon. The Chief asks how to stop spiritual contamination, and Summer replies that the only way to do so is to eliminate the source of Mania entirely: Black Rings. She states that the Inheritances are the sole cause of Black Rings, and that should she be able to get her hands on one, she would finally be able to learn "the truth of the world." The Chief tries to describe the Inheritance without revealing that they have absorbed it, but Summer, having already infiltrated the Bureau's intranet, has already figured out the truth. She becomes increasingly frantic and excited at the possibility of the discoveries she could make, turning her weapons on the Chief. When the Chief tries to call for help, they find that Summer has already disabled the security systems. Chiding that they have underestimated the power of //Infinite Knowledge//, Summer hits them with a tranquilizer shot, quickly knocking them unconscious. The Ring Research Institute scientist, whose name is revealed to be Laplace, receives word that the Chief and Summer have gone missing. Having already anticipated this outcome, he suspects that they have gone to the ruins of the PARMA Laboratory.

Summer's senses are just too sharp. She catches on that something's wrong from just a few words. Her curiosity has been ignited after learning that you've absorbed the Inheritance. After bringing you under control, this mad scientist is now free of all restraints.
interrogation3:
The Chief awakens in a glass containment tank, finding that Summer has somehow disabled the Shackles. She calls the Chief "the ideal candidate for the Inheritance," confident that they won't mutate into a monster. She explains that PARMA Laboratory was where the Inheritance was originally stored, making it the perfect testing ground for her own experiments on it. She fills the tank with a blue solution she calls "Inheritance Catalyst Number Three," which plunges the Chief back into the corrupting sensations of their earlier nightmare while somehow mitigating their anxiety. They deduce that Summer wants to replicate the Inheritance's original form, but soon, the holding tank begins to collapse. As the Chief attempts to persuade the panicking Summer about the dangerous nature of the Inheritance, Laplace emerges from the shadows. He makes Summer an offer: return to the Research Institute and he'll not only protect her from the MBCC, but give her all the funding and facilities she needs to finish her current project. Summer calls Laplace boring. He says that the "tragedy of PARMA" won't happen again, attempting to entice her with the promise of making her a hero, but she refuses. She reveals that the Institute sold her research to PARMA and that she has no intention of trusting them ever again. After warning the Chief that a battle is about to begin, dozens of armed men open fire on her. Laplace taunts her, but Summer quickly turns the tides of battle, reducing all of his backup to ash. Laplace dons a strange glove that glows with a blue light, its aura reminding Chief of their battle with the Corpseborne. The Chief reaches inside their mind, digging for the "truth" that Summer has been searching for, and manages to harness the power of the Inheritance with the help of the state induced by the solution. Extending the Shackles through the tank, they empower Summer to be able to withstand Laplace's attack. The two scientists fire their weapons at the same time, filling the room with a blinding white light.

The Ring Research Institute anticipated all of Summer's actions. Even the research conducted on you is part of their plan. Laplace, or rather the Ring Research Institute, anticipated everything. They want to use you to lure Summer back to the Ring Research Institute. However, it seems that this genius doesn't have the best relationship with the institute. The blazing light that pierced the sky once again shines over the Laboratory of Parma.
interrogation4:
The Chief awakens in an unknown infirmary with Summer standing over them. She informs them that while their body is in good shape, the Inheritance is still inside of them, and based on her research, she can't guarantee their safety if they either overuse the Shackles of get too close to another Black Ring. She warns the Chief that danger may accompany further learning on the subject, and in turn, the Chief warns her that the longer they spend away from the Bureau, the more likely that Summer's punishment will be more severe than a trip to the confinement cell. Summer says that they can do so after they finish //Age of Youth//. She takies the Chief downstairs, changes into a school uniform, and says that today, they'll be filming it in person.She has brought the Chief to a high school on graduation day, intending to finally gain the experience of graduating for herself. As the ceremony begins, Summer reflects on the loneliness she felt in school. In her mind, //Age of Youth// has to end with Summer's return to normal life with her friends, but without any friends to speak of, Summer says that she'll make due the Chief. Once the last diploma is handed out, the Chief asks Summer if she wants to mingle with the students. She hesitates, and Nightingale finally gets through, promising that a rescue team will arrive shortly. The Chief apologizes, but Summer is understanding. In the car on the way back to the Bureau, Summer says that future battles will only be tougher, but that with the Chief as her companion, she will surely find a way to save the world. Later, in the confinement cell, Summer complains that without chocolate, she won't be able to finish animating //Age of Youth.// Although the Chief threatens to lower her supply, they decide to raise it instead, hoping that this small act of kindness can begin to compensate Summer for once again missing the graduation of her dreams.

The last episode of The Age of Youth is finally released in a high school of Eastside. No special effect or expensive props. It just feels like some ordinary life moment, but it becomes a regret of Summer's that can never be compensated.
arrestRec1: Following an order from the top, the MBCC spent a long time tracking and observing the subject and finally arrested her when she attended her graduation ceremony while still injured. The subject had prepared close to ten escape plans but still ended up being captured by the Chief personally.
arrestRec2: Born in an Eastside family with a scientific and engineering background, the subject has demonstrated incredible intelligence and a gift for mechanical engineering since a young age. At fourteen, the subject had already mastered all doctoral courses and was exceptionally accepted into the Ring Research Institute by recommendation as a junior high school student, making headlines in Eastside.
arrestRec3: As one of the youngest researchers in the Ring Research Institute, Summer picked Ring Weapon as her research topic and quickly achieved monumental breakthroughs in the field. The research was then suspended for some unknown reason, while the subject was transferred to //Project Genius// by the institute.
arrestRec4: The institute passed the Ring Weapon to the Laboratory of Parma without Summer's agreement. She was enraged by this action and subsequently dug out the truth about the human experiments. After destroying the Parma lab, the subject escaped with the research result. She was charged with multiple crimes by the 9th Agency and included on the wanted list.
servingTerm1: Everything the subject owns has been highly customized by herself: a computer that follows her around, a hovering platform that carries her everywhere, the detention room that's been immediately modified into a lab.... Even her utensils are equipped with an artificial intelligence speech recognition system.
servingTerm2: Overly obsessed with the idea of a //free and fun high school life//. The complex and unusual personnel in the MBCC have never been able to satisfy her fantasy. She once attempted to create forty android classmates to be her companions but was stopped by the staff.
servingTerm3: The subject has been specially allowed to visit her family. It's been observed that Summer is able to effectively hold back her uninhibited behavior a couple days before and after her parents' visits.
servingTerm4: Has been strictly demanded by the Chief to swear off her Ring Weapon dependence and to train herself physically and walk with her feet. Summer has been following the training schedule very listlessly, keeping a record of four sit-ups in a minute. This is possibly the maximum compromise she's made in order to make the Chief stay and watch anime with her.

supervision1:
++* ⚠ Mysterious Hacker

//The Supervision Center seems to have been hacked, but...//

**System Notifications:** The Supervision Center was hacked but no information was leaked. On the contrary, the hacker optimized the internal code structure. The technical department discovered a string of mysterious codes in the database. After decoding the string, it was revealed as a picture of chocolate.

* **Prompt:** Buy some chocolate

**System Notifications:** Shortly after that, you discovered a smiley face on the Supervision Center's display screen.
supervision2:
++* ⚠ Summer Stringy Special

//Summer seems especially happy today.//

**System Notifications:** Summer gave you a bag of speciality coffee from her latest research, and you were awake for an entire night after drinking it.

* **Prompt:** Nice coffee.

**System Notifications:** The coffee tastes really good, but after staying up for the entire night, fatigue suddenly takes over you.
supervision3:
++* ⚠⚠ A Dangerous Invention

//You discover that the Energy Furnace's production capacity has grown significantly.//

**System Notifications:** Supervision System:
The Energy Furnace's production capacity has grown significantly. Go and check?

* **Prompt:** Go and check

**Chief:** What are you doing here, Summer?

**Summer:** Since you're here, it means you've already noticed my invention, Chief.

**Summer:** Ta-da! Summer's energy amplifier! With this tiny supplementary device, I've enhanced the Energy Furnace's production cycle and resource utilization. The average output is now more than 50% higher!

**Summer:** Only at a... very small cost.

* **Prompt:** What cost?

**Summer:** The Energy Furnace has a 0.003% daily failure rate.

* **Prompt:** And what are the consequences of a failure?

**Summer:** It'll instantly produce a large amount of energy, which will cause a certain impact on the closed underground environment it's situated in.

* **Prompt:** Which means...

**Summer:** To put it simply, the whole MBCC will blow up.

* **Prompt:** Stop Summer

**Summer:** Eh? Can't you support science with your actions, Chief?

**Chief:** I prefer to choose to stay alive with my actions...
supervision4:
++* ⚠⚠ Machine Intrusion

//Alert! An unknown machine has intruded into the Bureau.//

**System Notifications:** Warning. Warning. An unknown machine has broken in. Security program has been launched to destroy it. View incident report?

* **Prompt:** View

**System Notifications:** Intruder Identity: Micro-robot
Intrusion Purpose: To steal multiple chocolate sticks

**System Notifications:** Intruder Composition: electric watch part x5, resin figure part x17, unknown part x6, tomato x1
Casualties: 5, slightly injured

* **Prompt:** Send for Summer

**Summer:** Oh, are you looking for me, Chief? What's the matter?

**Chief:** Did you make that little robot that stole chocolate sticks?

**Summer:** What are you talking about? I'm not sure I understand.

**Chief:** Cut it out. There's only one person in the Bureau who can make a robot out of those materials.

**Summer:** Hey, you can't just put the blame on me based on that assumption. We should catch up with some detective anime this weekend together, Chief.

* **Prompt:** Scold Summer
 * **Chief:** Someone got injured.
 * **Summer:** What? I-I'm sorry... I already limited the robot's combat function. Was it still too strong?
 * **Summer:** Are the injuries serious?
 * **Chief:** No, but I'll have to put you in the Confinement Cell for a day.
 * **Summer:** Sob...

* **Prompt:** Ask Summer
 * **Chief:** Why did you need a tomato to make a robot?
 * **Summer:** Well, I'll tell you when I'm in the mood. But of course, if you give me some more chocolate... I can let you have a peek at the trial version of my exclusive blueprint.
 * **Chief:** Never do that again, or I'll send you to the Confinement Cell.
 * **Summer:** Sob...
supervision5:
++* ⚠⚠⚠ Scriptwriting Contest

//Summer signs up for an anime scriptwriting contest.//

**System Notifications:** Summer is concentrating on writing something with a pen and paper.

* **Prompt:** Approach and ask

**Chief:** What are you doing?

**Summer:** It's you, Chief. I've enrolled in an anime scriptwriting contest, but I'm struggling for an idea...

**Summer:** Why don't you help me think of the rest of the plot?

**Summer:** This is a story about a genius high school girl, and a transfer student who's lost memories!

**Summer:** First, the two of them are...

* **Prompt:** Friends
 * **Summer:** Yup, alright, they're friends.
 * **Summer:** The two of them develop a giant robot together and fight against all kinds of evil! I'm really psyched just thinking about it!
 * **Summer:** The two keep on fighting until the story takes a wild turn! Haha, I love the final twist of the story.
 * **Summer:** And the twist is...
 * **Prompt:** The transfer student is a villain.
 * **Summer:** Nice idea. Who'd have thought the transfer student was on team villain too?
 * **Summer:** So the two have a destined battle, and finally the transfer student collapses in the genius high school girl's arms. Sob, how touching...
 * **Summer:** I'll submit my entry right away.
 * **Chief:** Isn't the story too simple?
 * **Summer:** Come on, it's such an emotional story!
 * **System Notifications:** A few months later, Summer receives a response from the organizer. As expected, her script didn't win any awards...

* **Prompt:** Lovers
 * **Summer:** Oh my, they're lovers. My cheeks are burning.
 * **Summer:** But that's right, every giant robot anime could use a romance plotline.
 * **Summer:** The transfer student and the genius high school girl fall in love with each other, and then... they develop a giant robot together!
 * **Prompt:** Express doubts
 * **Chief:** Isn't this development a bit too abrupt?
 * **Summer:** Oh, don't get bogged down with the details. We can fill them in later.
 * **Summer:** Anyway, the two of them pilot the giant robot in different scenes as a couple!
 * **Summer:** In the end, to protect her lover, the genius high school girl dies in the transfer student's arms. Sob... I'm getting a little teary-eyed.
 * **Prompt:** Express doubts
 * **Chief:** But how does she die all of a sudden...
 * **Summer:** Never mind the details. Anyway, it's very touching. I'll add the details later.
 * **Summer:** Alright! It's all done! Once I fill in the details, I'll submit my entry!
 * **System Notifications:** A few months later, Summer receives a response from the organizer. As expected, her script didn't win any awards...
supervision6:
++* ⚠⚠⚠ Time Machine

//Summer is apparently researching the time machine.//

**System Notifications:** Rumors about Summer researching a time machine are circulating in the Bureau.

* **Prompt:** Investigate

**Summer:** Oh? Are you looking for me, Chief?

**Summer:** Time machine? Hehe, are you into this kind of sci-fi too, Chief?

**Summer:** Theoretically, it's impossible to construct a time machine.

**Summer:** However, I've been researching the Hypercube's effect on particle acceleration lately, and I might just have made some progress.

**Summer:** If I succeed, I may be able to transport particles a few milliseconds back in time.

**Summer:** What do you think, Chief? Will you support my research?

* **Prompt:** Yes
 * **System Notifications:** For the sake of science, you decide to support Summer's research.
 * **System Notifications:** A month later, Summer finally obtains the data she wants, while you receive an astronomical electricity bill.
 * **Chief:** Somehow I feel fooled...

* **Prompt:** No
 * **Summer:** Humph. You're so stingy, Chief.
 * **System Notifications:** You don't have adequate resources to support Summer's research, so you reject her request.
 * **System Notifications:** A few months later, rumors begin spreading in the Bureau that Summer has successfully built a time machine but you've hidden it away.
baseVoicelines: [Obtain the Sinner] MBCC's technology is kind of lagging behind, Chief. How can you expect to jail me with this kind of equipment? Why don't you do a system upgrade? I can get it done for you in the blink of an eye. [Raise to Phase 1] Here comes the hero! Ahem... How did I do? I've been wanting to say that line for a while. [Raise to Phase 3] Controller center is successfully connected. Summer is ready. Time to go save this dark world! [Level Start] My skirt will get dirty in this kind of place. [Win Battles] Evil will eventually be vanquished. Hmm... That's a pretty sick line too. [Lose Battles] Aargh... There must have been something wrong with the Ring Weapon's parameter settings. Let's try one more time! [Ultimate Skill] Full system locked on, clear area! [Die in Battles] No... I haven't even had... my graduation... [Greeting] Hi, Chief! While you were away, I came up with a new idea... Have you ever thought about replacing an arm or a leg with a more functional one? Or maybe... upgrading your brain? [Conversation 1] Watch closely. This is the Ring Weapon, not a Mania weapon. They are fundamentally different. Give me a break. How could I possibly make an inferior product like that? [Conversation 2] A scientific genius needs loads of sugar to sustain her thinking, and chocolate is the best choice. What's more, it's a perfect match for a high school girl. What I'm trying to say is that... Can you approve my purchase application already? I promise to give you some! [Conversation 3] The only weakness of that robot is its looks. It's different from those common models! Stop mocking it, or I'm gonna get mad. And apologize to the model! [Special Conversation 1] Friends? I don't need them. Who says high school girls must have friends? Don't you think weird, gorgeous, mysterious robot-geek genious at school works better as a character concept? [Special Conversation 2] This place is like heaven compared to the Ring Research Institute! I can decorate my room as I like and set my schedule freely. Above all, I can watch anime anytime and anywhere I want! [Special Conversation 3] It sucks having to go into battle myself. My skirt has gotten dirty a few times. But seeing as it's your request...Alright, I'll do it for you. In return, you'll be my test subject for a day. Deal? [Full Compliance] I've noticed there have been a few moments when you looked pretty heroic... Hey, are you interested in becoming a giant robot pilot? I already have a rough design in mind! [Idle] Let's begin today's workout routine! Breathe in, breathe out. Awesome! What a perfect diaphragmatic breathing exercise. Goal reached. Time to head back and eat some ice cream, woo-hoo! [Annoyed] No workout today... Let me be a couch potato for just one day... [Special Attention] Are you curious about me? Hehe, I want to observe you closely too. [Dispatch] Eh... I've got an errand to run? [Dispatch Complete] If it weren't for the Ring Weapon... I would have died of exhaustion... [Level Up] Sugar, replenished! [Pat Head] Hmm? What is it? You didn't fully grasp the topic I explained just now? Well, well... if it's for you, I can repeat it as many times as you want.
attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
"You want my treasure? Then find it in WhiteSands!" Hehe, what do you think?! Isn't this line perfect in this situation?

[Greeting]
The claw strength is up to standard. Let me try them on the Chief! Ahem... Morning, Chief! Wanna go experiment... explore WhiteSands?

[Ordinary Contact 1]
The ritual of treasure hunting should come first, of course! ... I don't think it's too hot to wear this much! Do you not believe in the 30 cooling modules installed in the clothes?!

[Ordinary Contact 2]
Chocolate—Chocolate—Hmm? There's none left... I can't believe it's gone so fast! Sigh, I should have brought more.

[Ordinary Contact 3]
If you put a propeller on your head, then a solar panel and a steering system, and finally, a battery, you can replace my drone and become the most intelligent detector in WhiteSands! So? Wanna try?

[Ordinary Contact 4]
Ah... Let me rest for a bit... I just finished checking the power system of the sand boat... I'm too tired to move...

[Idle] 
Wow... what a ferocious sandstorm!

[Special Attention] 
Huh? Why, it's Chief! Look at you... Are you here to find the treasure buried in WhiteSands?

[Level Up}
Mechanical sequence optimized!

[Pat Head]
Oh? Wanna try this too? Ha, looks like you can't resist the charm of this "Summer's special sand-prrof hat" either, Chief.
attireVoicelines2:
[Attire Obtained]
Ring substance engine pressure, check. Electronics and navigation system, check. Exterior, check. Enhanced Ring weapon for air combat, Summer 1... Lift off!

[Greeting]
How are you feeling, Chief? Isn't it just awesome to fly around in the sky?

[Ordinary Contact 1]
Woohoo! It's working pretty well! We're gonna make it to their prom on time.

[Ordinary Contact 2]
Um? New message. "Keep an eye on the altitude. Be careful not to damage the equipment." Come on, give me some credit.

[Ordinary Contact 3]
Of course I warmed up before the test flight. I've done two whole sit-ups!

[Ordinary Contact 4]
You say the armor is not thick enough? Hehe... won't be a problem, as long as we don't get hit.

[Idle] 
Um... Vegetables and fruits grown from seeds that went to space can be unusually large. Chief, do you think it's possible that cocoa made from beans that went to space tastes sweeter? Hehehe...

[Special Attention] 
Alas, just relax, Chief! There are sixteen smart flight modules built into your gear. You could take a long nap in the mid air, and still wouldn't have to worry about falling to the ground.

[Level Up}
For the blue and pure sky!

[Pat Head]
I wanted to make this back when I was at the Ring Research Institute! But those old geezer kept turning me down, saying they didn't have enough budget. Hehe, but I know Chief is the best!

voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - KR: 위기관리국의 기술이 좀 후진 것 같은데요, 국장님, 이런 시설로 날 가둘 수 있을 거라 생각해요? 시스템 업그레이드 한 번 하시죠, 제가 손쉽게 도와줄 수 있어요.
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - CN: 危机管理局的技术有点落后呀，局长，这种设备怎么关得住我呢？不如做一次系统升级吧，我可以轻松帮你搞定哦。
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - TW: 危機管理局的技術有點落後呀，局長，這種設備怎麼關得住我呢？不如做一次系統升級吧，我可以輕鬆幫你搞定哦。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - EN: Here comes the hero! Ahem... How did I do? I've been wanting to say that line for a while.
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - JP: ヒーロー、登場！こほん……どう？このセリフ言ってみたかったんだぁ～！
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - KR: 영·웅·등·장! Hey… 어때요? 오래전부터 이 명대사를 해보고 싶었다고요.
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - CN: 英·雄·登·场！咳……怎么样，我早就想说这句名台词了。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - TW: 英·雄·登·場！咳……怎麼樣，我早就想說說這句名台詞了。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - EN: Controller center is successfully connected. Summer is ready. Time to go save this dark world!
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - JP: コントローラー中枢リンク完了、夏音も準備OK！この闇の世界を救っていくわよ！
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - KR: 제어기 중추 연결 완료, 여름이 Ready, 암흑의 세상을 구원하러 출동!
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - CN: 控制器中枢连接完成，夏音ready，该去拯救这漆黑的世界了！
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - TW: 控制器中樞連接完成，夏音ready，該去拯救這漆黑的世界了！
voicelines.Level Start - EN: My skirt will get dirty in this kind of place.
voicelines.Level Start - JP: そんなところ行ったら、スカートが汚れちゃうって。
voicelines.Level Start - KR: 그런 곳에 가면 치마가 더러워질 거라고요.
voicelines.Level Start - CN: 去这种地方，裙子会脏的。
voicelines.Level Start - TW: 去這種地方，裙子會髒的。
voicelines.Win Battles - EN: Evil will eventually be vanquished. Hmm... That's a pretty sick line too.
voicelines.Win Battles - JP: 悪は、破れる運命なのだ……。うん……このセリフもいい……。
voicelines.Win Battles - KR: 악은 결국 패배할 거야. 음… 이 대사도 나쁘지 않네.
voicelines.Win Battles - CN: 邪恶，终究会被打败。嗯……这句台词也不错。
voicelines.Win Battles - TW: 邪惡，終究會被打敗。嗯……這句台詞也不錯。
voicelines.Lose Battles - EN: Aargh... There must have been something wrong with the Ring Weapon's parameter settings. Let's try one more time!
voicelines.Lose Battles - JP: うーん……きっとリング武器のパラメータの設定に問題があったのよ。もう1回！
voicelines.Lose Battles - KR: 힝… 링무기의 파라미터 설정 문제일 거야, 한 번 더 해보자!
voicelines.Lose Battles - CN: 唔……一定是环武器的参数设置出了问题，再来一次！
voicelines.Lose Battles - TW: 唔……一定是環武器的參數設置出了問題，再來一次！
voicelines.Ultimate Skill - EN: Full system locked on, clear area!
voicelines.Ultimate Skill - JP: 全機ロックオン、エリアクリア！
voicelines.Die in Battles - EN: No... I haven't even had... my graduation...
voicelines.Die in Battles - JP: うぅ……まだ……卒業してないのに……。
voicelines.Die in Battles - KR: 힝… 난 아직… 졸업 안 했는데…
voicelines.Greeting - EN: Hi, Chief! While you were away, I came up with a new idea... Have you ever thought about replacing an arm or a leg with a more functional one? Or maybe... upgrading your brain?
voicelines.Greeting - JP: やっほー！局長がいない間に新しいアイデアを思いついたの……手や足をもっと使いやすい物に取り替えるって考えたことある？他には……脳を強化するとか？
voicelines.Greeting - KR: Hi~국장님, 안 계실 때 새로운 아이디어를 생각해 냈어요…혹시 좀 더 쓰기 편한 팔이나 다리로 바꿔볼 생각 있으세요? 혹은…뇌를 강화한다던가?
voicelines.Greeting - CN: Hi~局长，你不在的时候我有了个新点子……你有考虑过换一只更好用的手或脚么？或者……增强一下你的大脑？
voicelines.Greeting - TW: Hi~局長，你不在的時候我有了個新點子……你有考慮過換一隻更好用的手或腳嗎？或者……增強一下你的大腦？
voicelines.Conversation 1 - EN: Watch closely. This is the Ring Weapon, not a Mania weapon. They are fundamentally different. Give me a break. How could I possibly make an inferior product like that?
voicelines.Conversation 1 - JP: ちゃんと見て。これはリング武器よ。死瞳武器じゃない。根本的に違うのよ。まったく、あたしがこんな粗悪品を作るわけないのに。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - KR: 잘 보세요, 이건 링·무·기예요, 괴·변·무·기가 아니라, 본질적으로 달라요. 정말, 제가 어떻게 그런 싸구려를 만들겠어요.
voicelines.Conversation 1 - CN: 看好了哦，这是环·武·器，不是死·役·武·器，它们有本质上的区别。真是的，我怎么可能做出那种劣质品。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - TW: 看好了哦，這是環·武·器，不是死·役·武·器，他們有本質上的區別。真是的，我怎麼可能做出那種劣質品。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - EN: A scientific genius needs loads of sugar to sustain her thinking, and chocolate is the best choice. What's more, it's a perfect match for a high school girl. What I'm trying to say is that... Can you approve my purchase application already? I promise to give you some!
voicelines.Conversation 2 - JP: 天才科学者は思考するために大量の糖分が必要で、チョコレートは最良の選択なの。女子高生にもぴったりだし。だから、局長……あたしの申請を承認してくれる？ちょっと分けてあげてもいいから！ね！
voicelines.Conversation 2 - KR: 천재 과학자는 대량의 당을 보충함으로써 그녀의 사고를 유지할 수 있다고 해요, 초콜릿이야말로 최고의 선택이죠. 게다가 그건 여고생과 최고 조합이기도 하죠. 그러니까, 국장님… 제 구매 청구서에 사인해 주실 거죠? 국장님께도 나눠드릴게요!
voicelines.Conversation 2 - CN: 天才科学家需要大量糖分来维持她的思考，巧克力就是最好的选择。何况，它跟女高中生还是绝配。所以，局长……你能批准我的采购申请了吗？可以分点给你的哦！
voicelines.Conversation 2 - TW: 天才科學家需要大量糖分來維持她的思考，巧克力就是最好的選擇。何況，它跟女高中生還是絕配。所以，局長……你能批准我的採購申請了嗎？可以分點給你的哦！
voicelines.Conversation 3 - EN: The only weakness of that robot is its looks! It's different from those common models! Stop mocking it, or I'm gonna get mad. And apologize to the model!
voicelines.Conversation 3 - JP: あの機体は見た目が悪いだけなの！一般的な機種とは違うんだって！それ以上言うと怒るから。早くモデルに謝って！
voicelines.Conversation 3 - KR: 머신의 외형이 좀 못생겼을 뿐! 일반 통용 기계랑은 전혀 달라요! 더 얘기하면 화낼 거예요, 모형에게 사과하세요!
voicelines.Conversation 3 - CN: 那台机体只是不好看而已！它和那些通用机型是不一样的！你再说我可就要生气了，快给模型道歉！
voicelines.Conversation 3 - TW: 那台機體只是不好看而已！它和那些通用機型是不一樣的！你再說我可就要生氣了，快給模型道歉！
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - EN: Friends? I don't need them. Who says high school girls must have friends? Don't you think weird, gorgeous, mysterious robot-geek genius at school works better as a character concept?
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - JP: 友達？いらなーい。女子高生には友達がいなくちゃいけないなんて誰が決めたの？「学園の天才怪人機甲ミステリアス美少女」って設定の方が面白いでしょ？
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - KR: 친구요? 필요 없는데요, 누가 여고생은 꼭 친구가 있어야 한대요? '캠퍼스 내 천재 괴물 메카닉 신비 미소녀'라는 설정이 훨씬 더 재미있어 보이지 않아요?
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - CN: 朋友？不需要哦，是谁规定女高中生一定要有朋友的。你不觉得“校园里的天才怪人机甲神秘美少女”这个设定更有意思吗？
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - TW: 朋友？不需要哦，是誰規定女高中生一定要有朋友的。你不覺得「校園裡的天才怪人機甲神秘美少女」這個設定更有意思嗎？
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - EN: This place is like heaven compared to the Ring Research Institute! I can decorate my room as I like and set my schedule freely. Above all, I can watch anime anytime and anywhere I want!
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - JP: ここはリング研究所に比べれば天国よ！部屋の中に自由に物が置けるだけじゃなくて、時間も自由に使えるし、何より、いつでもどこでもアニメが見られるし！
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - KR: 여기는 링 연구소랑 비교하면 천국이죠! 방도 내 맘대로 꾸밀 수 있고, 시간도 자유롭게 배분할 수 있고요, 제일 중요한 건 아무 때나 애니메이션을 볼 수 있다는 거예요!
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - CN: 这里和中央研究院比简直就是天堂！不仅可以随意布置房间，还能自由分配时间，最重要的是，可以随时随地看动画！
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - TW: 這裡和環研究院比簡直就是天堂！不僅可以隨意佈置房間，還能自由分配時間，最重要的是，可以隨時隨地看動畫！
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - EN: It sucks having to go into battle myself. My skirt has gotten dirty a few times. But seeing as it's your request... Alright, I'll do it for you. In return, you'll be my test subject for a day, deal?
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - JP: 自分で戦うって本当に面倒くさいねぇ。スカートはいっつも汚れるし。でも、局長のお願いだったら……手伝ってあげるよ。その代わり、一日だけ実験体になってね。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - KR: 직접 출전하는 건 정말 귀찮아요, 내 치마도 여러 번 더러워졌었단 말이에요. 하지만, 국장님이 요청하는 거라면… 도와드려야죠, 대신 하루 정도 저의 실험체가 돼 주어야 해요.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - CN: 亲自出战真的很麻烦，我的裙子都被弄脏好几次了。不过，既然是局长的请求……我就来帮帮你吧，作为报酬，你要乖乖当我一天的试验体。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - TW: 親自出戰真的很麻煩，我的裙子都被弄髒好幾次了。不過，既然是局長的請求……我就來幫幫你吧，作為報酬，你要乖乖當我一天的實驗體。
voicelines.Full Compliance - EN: I've noticed there have been a few moments when you looked pretty heroic... Hey, are you interested in becoming a giant robot pilot? I already have a rough design in mind!
voicelines.Full Compliance - JP: 局長が英雄みたいだなーって思っちゃう瞬間があるんだけど……どう？機甲パイロットになる気はない？デザインの方向性はもう考えてあるんだよ！
voicelines.Full Compliance - KR: 내가 포착했는데 몇몇 순간에 국장님이 제법 영웅다운 느낌이 있어요… 어때요? 머신 기사에 도전해 보실래요? 이미 설계 방향도 다 생각해 두었다고요!
voicelines.Full Compliance - CN: 我发现，有那么几个瞬间，局长还挺有英雄范儿的……怎么样，有兴趣做机甲驾驶员吗？我已经想好设计方向了！
voicelines.Full Compliance - TW: 我發現，有那麼幾個瞬間，局長還挺有英雄范兒的……怎麼樣，有興趣做機甲駕駛員嗎？我已經想好設計方向了！
voicelines.Idle - EN: Let's begin today's workout routine! Breathe in, breathe out. Awesome! What a perfect diaphragmatic breathing exercise. Goal reached. Time to head back and eat some ice cream, woo-hoo!
voicelines.Idle - JP: 今日の運動スケジュールスタート！ふぅ————ふぅ————OK！完璧な腹式呼吸。目標達成、帰ってアイスクリームを食べよ～。
voicelines.Idle - KR: 오늘의 운동 스타트! 후~~~~후~~~~~OK！완벽한 복식 호흡이었어, 목표 달성, 아이스크림 먹으러 가야지~
voicelines.Idle - CN: 开始今天的运动日程！呼——————呼——————OK！完美的腹式呼吸，目标完成，回去吃雪糕咯~
voicelines.Idle - TW: 開始今天的運動日程！呼——————呼——————OK！完美的腹式呼吸，目標完成，回去吃雪糕囉~
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: No workout today... Let me be a couch potato for just one day...
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: 運動なんか——したくない——一日だけでも怠け者になりたい——
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 나~~ 운동하기~~~ 싫어~~! 하루만 게으름 피우게 놔두라고~~~
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 我不想——运动——就让我当一天的懒鬼吧——
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 我不想——運動——就讓我當一天的懶鬼吧——
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: Are you curious about me? Hehe, I want to observe you closely too.
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: あたしに興味があるの？ふふ、あたしもあなたをもっと近くでよく見たいな。
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 저한테 관심 있으세요? 히힛, 저도 가까이서 당신을 관찰하고 싶어요.
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 对我感兴趣吗？嘿嘿，我也想近距离观察你呢。
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 對我感興趣嗎？嘿嘿，我也想近距離觀察你呢。
voicelines.Dispatch - EN: Eh... I've got an errand to run?
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - EN: If it weren't for the Ring Weapon... I would have died of exhaustion...
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - JP: はぁ……はぁ……リング武器がなかったら……戦えないよ……
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - KR: 아하… 아하… 링무기가 아니었다면… 나 힘들어 죽었을 거야…
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - CN: 哈啊……哈啊……要不是有环武器……我就要累死了……
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - TW: 哈啊……哈啊……要不是有環武器……我就要累死了……
voicelines.Pat Head - EN: Hmm? What is it? You didn't fully grasp the topic I explained just now? Well, well... If it's for you, I can repeat it as many times as you want.
voicelines.Pat Head - JP: えっ？どうしたの？さっきの説明でわからないとこあった？そっか……局長になら、何度でも教えてあげるよ。
voicelines.Pat Head - KR: 응? 왜요? 아까 설명한 내용을 이해 못 하셨나요? 아이고… 국장님이라면 몇 번이고 설명해드릴 수 있죠.
voicelines.Pat Head - CN: 嗯？怎么了？是刚才的知识点没听懂么？哎呀……如果是局长的话，给你讲多少次都行哦。
voicelines.Pat Head - TW: 嗯？怎麼了？是剛才的知識點沒聽懂嗎？哎呀……如果是局長的話，給你講多少次都行哦。

voicelines.Attire Obtained - EN: "You want my treasure? Then find it in WhiteSands!" Hehe, what do you think?! Isn't this line perfect in this situation?
voicelines.Attire Obtained - JP: 「あたしの宝が欲しいか？この世の全てを砂の海に置いてきた！」へへ～どう？この場面にピッタリのセリフでしょ？
voicelines.Attire Obtained - KR: 내 보물을 원해? 그럼 화이트 샌드로 와라!' 헤헤, 어때요?! 여기서 이 대사가 특히 딱이지 않아요?
voicelines.Attire Obtained - CN: “想要我的宝藏吗？那就踏上砂海吧！”嘿嘿，怎么样！这句台词用在这里是不是特别应景？
voicelines.Attire Obtained - TW: 「想要我的寶藏嗎？那就踏上砂海吧！」嘿嘿，怎麼樣！這句台詞用在這裡是不是特別應景？
voicelines.Greeting - EN: The claw strength is up to standard. Let me try them on the Chief! Ahem... Morning, Chief! Wanna go experiment... explore WhiteSands?
voicelines.Greeting - JP: クローの物を掴む能力は合格ね！ まずは局長で試してみよう～っと！あっ……局長おはよ！一緒に実験……さ、砂の海に探険しに行かない？？
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 갈고리의 쥐는 힘은 합격인데… 일단 국장님에게 시험해봐야겠다! 켁… 구…굿모닝 국장님! 가…같이 실험… 아니, 화이트 샌드 탐험하러 갈래요?
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 钩爪抓取力合格，先拿局长试试好了！咳……早啊局长！要一起去实验……一起去砂海探险吗？？
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 鉤爪抓取力合格，先拿局長試試好了！咳……早啊局長！要一起去實驗……一起去砂海探險嗎？？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: The ritual of treasure hunting should come first, of course! ...I don't think it's too hot to wear this much! Do you not believe in the 30 cooling modules installed in the clothes?!
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - JP: 宝探しは雰囲気が一番大事なの！……着込んでても暑くなんてないって！服に30個も冷却モジュール仕込んでるんだから！
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: 보물을 찾는 여정에서 의식감은 당연히 가장 중요한 것 아닌가요!… 이렇게 많이 입어도 하나도 안 덥거든요? 설마 옷 안에 있는 쿨링 모듈 30개의 성능을 무시하는 거예요?!
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - CN: 寻宝时的仪式感当然要放在第一位了！……就算穿这么多也不会热的！你这是瞧不起衣服里加的三十个降温模块么！
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - TW: 尋寶時的儀式感當然要放在第一位了！……就算穿這麼多也不會熱的！你這是瞧不起衣服裡加的三十個降溫模組嗎！
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: Chocolate—Chocolate—Hmm? There's none left... I can't believe it's gone so fast! Sigh, I should've brought more.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - JP: チョコ～チョコ～あれ？ない……こんなに早くなくなるなんて！はぁ、こんなことならもっと持ってくるべきだったなぁ。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - KR: 초콜릿~ 초콜릿~ 에엣? 없다고? …이렇게 빨리 소모하다니! 에휴, 이럴 줄 알았으면 몇 박스 더 가지고 올걸.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - CN: 巧克力——巧克力——嗯？没了……居然消耗得这么快！唉，早知道就多带几箱了。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - TW: 巧克力——巧克力——嗯？沒了……居然消耗得這麼快！唉，早知道就多帶幾箱了。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - EN: If you put a propeller on your head, then a solar panel and steering system, and finally a battery, you can replace my drone and become the most intelligent detector in WhiteSands! So? Wanna try?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - JP: 頭の上にプロペラを付けて、それからソーラーパネルと方向転換システムを設置。最後にバッテリーを取り付けたら、あたしのドローンの代わりに、砂の海で一番知能の高い偵察機になれるね！どう？試してみる？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - KR: 만약 당신의 머리 위에 프로펠러를 장착하고, 태양열 건전지와 방향 조절 시스템을 설치해서, 어튬어레이터까지 하나 더 넣으면… 당신은 나의 드론을 대신할 화이트 샌드 최고의 스마트 정찰기가 될 수 있어요! 어때요, 한 번 해볼까요?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - CN: 要是在你的头顶装上螺旋桨，再放上太阳能电池板和转向系统，最后加一块蓄电池，这样你就可以代替我的无人机，成为这砂海中最智能的侦查器了！怎么样，要不要试一试？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - TW: 要是在你的頭頂裝上螺旋槳，再放上太陽能電池板和轉向系統，最後加一塊蓄電池，這樣你就可以代替我的無人機，成為這砂海中最智慧的偵查器了！怎麼樣，要不要試一試？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - EN: Ah... Let me rest for a bit... I just finished checking the power system of the sand boat... I'm too tired to move...
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - JP: ふぁ……ちょっと休ませて……今、砂の船のパワーシステムを一通り調べたところなの……もう疲れて動けないよ……。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - KR: 아… 조금만 쉴래요… 아까 모래배의 동력 시스템을 싹 한 번 검사했더니 너무 피곤해서 꼼짝도 못 하겠어요…
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - CN: 啊……让我歇一会儿……我刚把砂船的动力系统检查完……实在累得动不了了……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - TW: 啊……讓我歇一會……我剛把砂船的動力系統檢查完……實在累得動不了了……
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: Huh? Why, it's Chief! Look at you... Are you here to find the treasure buried in WhiteSands?
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: あれっ？局長だ！その装備……まさか局長も砂の海に埋められたお宝を探しに来たの？
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 잉? 국장님이잖아? 보아하니… 국장님도 화이트 샌드에 묻혀있는 보물을 찾으러 온 거구만?
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 咦？这不是局长么！看你这幅样子……难道你也是来寻找埋藏在这片砂海中的宝藏的？
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 咦？這不是局長嗎！看你這幅樣子……難道你也是來尋找埋藏在這片砂海中的寶藏的？
voicelines.Pat Head - EN: Oh? Wanna try this too? Ha, looks like you can't resist the charm of this "Summer's special sand-proof hat" either, Chief.
voicelines.Pat Head - JP: あれ？これを試してみたいの？ふふん～局長もこの「ナツネスペシャル円筒砂除け帽子」の魅力にやられたみたいだね。
voicelines.Pat Head - KR: 오오? 이거 해보고 싶어요? 후훗, 보아하니 국장님도 이 여름이가 '특별 제작한 원통 샌드 캡'의 매력을 이겨낼 수가 없군요~
voicelines.Pat Head - CN: 哦？你也想试试这个么？哼哼，看来局长也抵挡不住这顶“夏音特制圆筒防沙帽”的魅力嘛。
voicelines.Pat Head - TW: 哦？你也想試試這個嗎？哼哼，看來局長也抵擋不住這頂「夏音特製圓筒防沙帽」的魅力嘛。

voicelines.Attire Obtained - EN: Ring substance engine pressure, check. Electronics and navigation system, check. Exterior, check. Enhanced Ring weapon for air combat, Summer 1... Lift off!
voicelines.Attire Obtained - JP: リング物質エンジンの圧力正常。電子機械とGPSも正常。本体に損傷なし。空戦強化型リング武器、Summer1号——出る！
voicelines.Attire Obtained - KR: 링 물질 발동기 압력 정상. 전자 설비, 내비게이션 시스템 정상. 외부 기체 손상 없음. 공중전 강화형 링무기, Summer 1호 출발!
voicelines.Attire Obtained - CN: 环物质发动机压力正常，电子设备和导航系统正常，外部机体无损伤。空战强化型环武器，Summer1号——出发！
voicelines.Attire Obtained - TW: 環物質發動機壓力正常，電子設備和導航系統正常，外部機體無損傷。空戰強化型環武器，Summer1號——出發！
voicelines.Greeting - EN: How are you feeling, Chief? Isn't it just awesome to fly around in the sky?
voicelines.Greeting - JP: 局長ーーどう？この空を飛ぶ感じ、いいでしょ？
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 국장님, 어때요? 하늘을 훨훨 나는 느낌, 너무 신나지 않아요?
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 局长——怎么样，翱翔在天空中的感觉，是不是很棒？
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 局長——怎麼樣，翱翔在天空中的感覺，是不是很棒？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: Woohoo! It's working pretty well! We're gonna make it to their prom on time.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - JP: う～ん——ベストコンディション！これなら隣の学校の卒業パーティーに間に合う！
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: 와우우~ 상태가 엄청 좋아요! 이대로라면 근처에 있는 학교의 졸업 파티에 늦지 않게 도착할 수 있겠어요!
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - CN: Woo——状态良好！这下就能赶上隔壁的毕业晚会了！
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - TW: Woo——狀態良好！這下就能趕上隔壁的畢業晚會了！
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: Um? New message. "Keep an eye on the altitude. Be careful not to damage the equipment." Come on, give me some credit.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - JP: ん？メッセージ……？「設備を壊さないよう、高度に注意してくれ」？はぁ……「夏音」って名を最低限信頼してよ！
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - KR: 음… 메시지가 왔네? 비행 높이에 주의하세요. 장비가 망가지지 않도록 주의하세요? 에이… 나에 대한 기본적인 믿음도 없는 거야?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - CN: 嗯……有消息？注意飞行高度，不要撞坏设备？哼……起码对夏音这两个字有一些基本的信任啊。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - TW: 嗯……有消息？注意飛行高度，不要撞壞設備？哼……起碼對夏音這兩個字有一些基本的信任啊。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - EN: Of course I warmed up before the test flight. I've done two whole sit-ups!
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - JP: テスト飛行の前に準備運動はしたよ。腹筋を……2回もね！
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - KR: 비행 전 준비 운동은 당연한 거 아니겠어요? 윗몸 일으키기를 2번이나 했다고요!
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - CN: 试飞之前我当然做了准备运动，足足2个仰卧起坐呢！
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - TW: 試飛之前我當然做了準備運動，足足2個仰臥起坐呢！
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - EN: You say the armor is not thick enough? Hehe... won't be a problem, as long as we don't get hit.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - JP: 装甲、薄すぎ？へへ、当たらなければいいでしょ！
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - KR: 방호복이 너무 얇다고요? 헤헤, 맞지 않으면 어떻다 할 것도 없죠!
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - CN: 防护装甲太薄了？嘿嘿，只要不被打中就没问题啦！
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - TW: 防護裝甲太薄了？嘿嘿，只要不被打中就沒問題啦！
voicelines.Idle - EN: Um... Vegetables and fruits grown from seeds that went to space can be unusually large. Chief, do you think it's possible that cocoa made from beans that went to space tastes sweeter? Hehehe...
voicelines.Idle - JP: うーん……宇宙に行った種が巨大な実をつけるなら、宇宙に行ったホットココアはもっと甘くなるのかな？えへへっ～
voicelines.Idle - KR: 음… 우주에 다녀온 씨앗이 커다란 열매를 맺는다면, 하늘에 올라간 코코아도 좀 더 달지 않을까요, 국장님? 헤헤~
voicelines.Idle - CN: 嗯……既然去过太空的种子会结出巨大的果实，那局长你觉得上过天的热可可会不会更甜一点呢？嘿嘿~
voicelines.Idle - TW: 嗯……既然去過太空的種子會結出巨大的果實，那局長你覺得上過天的熱可可會不會更甜一點呢？嘿嘿~
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: Alas, just relax, Chief! There are sixteen smart flight modules built into your gear. You could take a long nap in the mid air, and still wouldn't have to worry about falling to the ground.
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: ああ局長、そんな緊張しないで！あなたの身体には、スマート飛行モジュールが16個もついてるから、空で寝ても大丈夫だよ！
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 아이고 국장님, 긴장하실 거 없어요! 국장님의 몸에는 16개의 스마트 비행 모듈이 장착되어 있는걸요? 하늘 위에서 잠을 잘 수도 있어요!
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 哎呀，局长你不用那么紧张的！你身上可是加装了16个智能飞行模块呢，就算在天上睡觉都没问题！
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 唉呀，局長你不用那麼緊張的！你身上可是加裝了16個智慧飛行模組呢，就算在天上睡覺都沒問題！
voicelines.Level Up - EN: For the blue and pure sky!
voicelines.Pat Head - EN: I wanted to make this back when I was at the Ring Research Institute! But those old geezers kept turning me down, saying they didn't have enough budget. Hehe, but I know Chief is the best!
voicelines.Pat Head - JP: これ、リング研究所にいた頃からやりたかったんだよね～！あのジジイたち、いっつも「予算がない、予算がない」とか言っててさ。やっぱ局長、最高～！
voicelines.Pat Head - KR: 링 연구소에 있을 때부터 이런 걸 해보고 싶었어요! 자꾸 예산이 모자라네 어쩌네 하는 늙은이들보다는 역시 국장님이 더 좋아요!
voicelines.Pat Head - CN: 在环研究院的时候我就想做这个了！那些老家伙们总说什么预算不够预算不够，还是局长好！
voicelines.Pat Head - TW: 在環研究院的時候我就想做這個了！那些老傢伙們總說什麼預算不夠預算不夠，還是局長好！
